title: Fisoew Womens Summer Mini Dress Casual Patchwork Short Sleeve Polo V Neck Striped Dresses with Pockets
description: Material: Lightweight and breathable fabrics are chosen for summer wear to keep you cool and comfortable
Design Style: The patchwork design and striped pattern gives the dress a sense of fashion and dynamic, perfect for casual or sports occasions
Modeling: The short-sleeved and v-neck design is not only thin, but also shows the neck line and adds femininity
Functional: Quipped with pockets, easy to carry small items and increase practicality
Occasions: Whether for daily travel, vacation or sports, this dress is ideal
